remarks: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-5" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlax.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlax.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlax5i $p |- ( A vH ( _|_ ` ( ( _|_ ` A ) vH B ) ) ) = A $.
